text: Yadi tomadera aghata lege thake, anurupa aghata to tadera'o legeche. Manusera madhye paryayakrame amara e dinagulora abartana ghata'i, yate allaha muminaganake janate parena ebam tomadera madhya theke kichu sankhyakake sahidarupe grahana karate parena. Ara allaha yalemaderake pachanda karena na
